name: Noisy Neighbour
description:
Controls

Move with [WASD] or [ARROW KEYS]
Run with [SHIFT]
Interact with [F]

How 2 Play

You are in your neighbours appartement and have to find noisy things. Wander around and search them. The character can move faster but that also creates more noises. So use it with caution! 

You can see how much noise you generate for the moment on noise-meter on the bottom right. There is another meter on the top which shows how much "awoken" your neighbour is. If this is full you will loose the game.

In order to get rid of your neighbours things you have to throw them away. This can be done by either "opening" a window and then throwing them out there or you can use the balcony. You might have to "open" the balcony door as well :-)

Dev Journey

This game was made for the brackeys game jam and I joined it pretty late. So I had less than 3 days to make it. And due to timezones I by accident expected to have 8hrs more. Therefor I had to cut some corners. 

But overall the core gameplay mechanic is there. I want to continue working on that game and would be really happy to get constructive feedback. 

I hope you enjoy playing the game.
